Education programs
Education programs

Genocide Education and Human Rights Initiative's missions tend towards closing the gap between survivors of genocide and access to a proper education that promotes a comprehensive understanding of the world coupled with cultural awareness.

Our Stories

Through my collections of stories and photos here, I hope to preserve the stories and artistic creations of the phenomenal individuals.

About

Narin Briar is an academic, human rights advocate, and interdisciplinary artist. She amplifies the voices of silenced ethnic and religious minorities.

Narin empowers the communities supports various projects and is currently involved in installing solar panels for Yazidi schools. Her impact full work has gained recognition, with her projects being displayed at prestigious institutions.

Voices Unsilenced
